pawul eekakawala ee thaththwaya athi wuwahoth mulu rate ma samaya samagiya sadacharaya thahawuru wima gana amuthuwen kiwayuthu natha.ape samajaye danata pawathna prawanatha salaka balana wita awurudu sirithwala niyama arutha nolabena bawa pene.awurudu charithra athara ‘nonagathaya’ yanu wen nam karena punyakalaya thula siyalu wada nawatha punya katayuthuwala yedennata niyama kara thibe.
